content: What is the name of the 1997 film that tells the story of a young lawyer who joins a prestigious law firm, only to discover it has a sinister side?

I believe the film you're referring to is "The Devil's Advocate," starring Keanu Reeves and Al Pacino. It was released in 1997 and follows the story of a young lawyer who moves to New York to work for a prestigious law firm, only to uncover dark secrets and supernatural elements within the firm.
